verses.verse: <S%G2532><s%> After <S%G3326><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%> I heard <S%G191><s%> something like a loud <S%G3173><s%> voice <S%G5456><s%> of a great <S%G3173><s%> multitude <S%G3793><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> heaven, <S%G3772><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Hallelujah! <S%G239><s%> Salvation, <S%G4991><s%> <S%G2532><s%> power, <S%G1411><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G99999><s%> belong to <S%G2962><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> God: <S%G2316><s%>

for <S%G3754><s%> true <S%G228><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> righteous <S%G1342><s%> are his <S%G846><s%> judgments. <S%G2920><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> he has judged <S%G2919><s%> the great <S%G3173><s%> prostitute, <S%G4204><s%> who <S%G3748><s%> corrupted <S%G5351><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> her <S%G846><s%> sexual immorality, <S%G4202><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he has avenged <S%G1556><s%> the blood <S%G129><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> servants <S%G1401><s%> at <S%G1537><s%> her <S%G846><s%> hand. <S%G5495><s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> A second <S%G1208><s%> said, <S%G2046><s%> "Hallelujah! <S%G239><s%> <S%G2532><s%> Her <S%G846><s%> smoke <S%G2586><s%> goes up <S%G305><s%> <S%G1519><s%> forever <S%G165><s%> and ever. <S%G165><s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> The twenty <S%G1501><s%> - four <S%G5064><s%> elders <S%G4245><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the four <S%G5064><s%> living creatures <S%G2226><s%> fell down <S%G4098><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> worshiped <S%G4352><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> who sits <S%G2521><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the throne, <S%G2362><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Amen! <S%G281><s%> Hallelujah! <S%G239><s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> A voice <S%G5456><s%> came forth <S%G1831><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the throne, <S%G2362><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Give praise <S%G134><s%> to our <S%G2257><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> you his <S%G846><s%> servants, <S%G1401><s%> <S%G2532><s%> you who <S%G3588><s%> fear <S%G5399><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> the <S%G2532><s%> small <S%G3398><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the great! <S%G3173><s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> I heard <S%G191><s%> something like <S%G5613><s%> the voice <S%G5456><s%> of a great <S%G4183><s%> multitude, <S%G3793><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> like <S%G5613><s%> the voice <S%G5456><s%> of many <S%G4183><s%> waters, <S%G5204><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> like <S%G5613><s%> the voice <S%G5456><s%> of mighty <S%G2478><s%> thunders, <S%G1027><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Hallelujah! <S%G239><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> our God, <S%G2316><s%> the Almighty, <S%G3841><s%> reigns! <S%G936><s%>

Let us rejoice <S%G21><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> be exceedingly glad, <S%G5463><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> let us give <S%G1325><s%> the glory <S%G1391><s%> to him. <S%G846><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> the marriage <S%G1062><s%> of the Lamb <S%G721><s%> has come, <S%G2064><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> wife <S%G1135><s%> has made <S%G2090><s%> herself <S%G1438><s%> ready. <S%G2090><s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> It was given <S%G1325><s%> to her <S%G846><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> she would array <S%G4016><s%> herself in bright, <S%G2986><s%> <S%G2532><s%> pure, <S%G2513><s%> fine linen: <S%G1039><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> the fine linen <S%G1039><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the righteous <S%G1345><s%> acts of the saints. <S%G40><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> He said <S%G3004><s%> to me, <S%G3427><s%> "Write, <S%G1125><s%> <S%G3107><s%> 'Blessed are those who <S%G3588><s%> are invited <S%G2564><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> the marriage <S%G1062><s%> supper <S%G1173><s%> of the Lamb. <S%G721><s%>'" <S%G2532><s%> He said <S%G3004><s%> to me, <S%G3427><s%> "These <S%G3778><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> true <S%G228><s%> words <S%G3056><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> I fell <S%G4098><s%> down before <S%G1715><s%> his <S%G846><s%> feet <S%G4228><s%> to worship <S%G4352><s%> him. <S%G846><s%> <S%G2532><s%> He said <S%G3004><s%> to me, <S%G3427><s%> "Look! <S%G3708><s%> Don't <S%G3361><s%> do it! <S%G1510><s%> I am a fellow bondservant <S%G4889><s%> with you <S%G4675><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> with your <S%G4675><s%> brothers <S%G80><s%> who hold <S%G2192><s%> the testimony <S%G3141><s%> of Jesus. <S%G2424><s%> Worship <S%G4352><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> the testimony <S%G3141><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> of Prophecy. <S%G4394><s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> I saw <S%G1492><s%> the heaven <S%G3772><s%> opened, <S%G455><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> behold, <S%G2400><s%> a white <S%G3022><s%> horse, <S%G2462><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he who sat <S%G2521><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> it <S%G846><s%> is called <S%G2564><s%> Faithful <S%G4103><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> True. <S%G228><s%> <S%G2532><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> righteousness <S%G1343><s%> he judges <S%G2919><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> makes war. <S%G4170><s%>

<S%G1161><s%> His <S%G846><s%> eyes <S%G3788><s%> are <S%G5613><s%> a flame <S%G5395><s%> of fire, <S%G4442><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> his <S%G846><s%> head <S%G2776><s%> are many <S%G4183><s%> crowns. <S%G1238><s%> He has <S%G3686><s%> names written and a name <S%G3686><s%> written <S%G1125><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> no one <S%G3762><s%> knows <S%G1492><s%> but <S%G1508><s%> he himself. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> He <S%G4016><s%> is clothed <S%G4016><s%> in a garment <S%G2440><s%> sprinkled <S%G911><s%> with blood. <S%G129><s%> <S%G2532><s%> His <S%G846><s%> name <S%G3686><s%> is called <S%G2564><s%> "The Word <S%G3056><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> The armies <S%G4753><s%> which are in <S%G1722><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%> followed <S%G190><s%> him <S%G846><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> white <S%G3022><s%> horses, <S%G2462><s%> clothed in <S%G1746><s%> white, <S%G3022><s%> <S%G2532><s%> pure, <S%G2513><s%> fine linen. <S%G1039><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> Out of <S%G1537><s%> his <S%G846><s%> mouth <S%G4750><s%> proceeds <S%G1607><s%> a sharp, <S%G3691><s%> double-edged <S%G4501><s%> sword, that <S%G2443><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> it <S%G846><s%> he <S%G846><s%> should strike <S%G3960><s%> the nations. <S%G1484><s%> <S%G2532><s%> He <S%G846><s%> will rule <S%G4165><s%> them <S%G846><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> an iron <S%G4603><s%> rod. <S%G4464><s%> He <S%G846><s%> treads <S%G3961><s%> the winepress <S%G3025><s%> <S%G3631><s%> of the fierceness <S%G2372><s%> of <S%G2532><s%> the wrath <S%G3709><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> the Almighty. <S%G3841><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> He has <S%G2192><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> his garment <S%G2440><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> his <S%G846><s%> thigh <S%G3382><s%> a name written, <S%G1125><s%> "KING <S%G935><s%> OF KINGS, <S%G935><s%> AND <S%G2532><s%> LORD <S%G2962><s%> OF LORDS. <S%G2962><s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> I saw <S%G1492><s%> an <S%G1520><s%> angel <S%G32><s%> standing <S%G2476><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the sun. <S%G2246><s%> <S%G2532><s%> He cried <S%G2896><s%> with a loud <S%G3173><s%> voice, <S%G5456><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%> to all <S%G3956><s%> the birds <S%G3732><s%> that fly <S%G4072><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the sky, <S%G3321><s%> "Come! <S%G1205><s%> <S%G2532><s%> Be gathered together <S%G4863><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> the great <S%G3173><s%> supper <S%G1173><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%>

that <S%G2443><s%> you may eat <S%G5315><s%> the flesh <S%G4561><s%> of kings, <S%G935><s%> <S%G2532><s%> the flesh <S%G4561><s%> of captains, <S%G5506><s%> <S%G2532><s%> the flesh <S%G4561><s%> of mighty men, <S%G2478><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the flesh <S%G4561><s%> of horses <S%G2462><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of those who sit <S%G2521><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the flesh <S%G4561><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> men, <S%G1658><s%> both free and <S%G2532><s%> slave, <S%G1401><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> small <S%G3398><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> great. <S%G3173><s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> I saw <S%G1492><s%> the beast, <S%G2342><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the kings <S%G935><s%> of the earth, <S%G1093><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> their <S%G846><s%> armies, <S%G4753><s%> gathered together <S%G4863><s%> to make <S%G4160><s%> war <S%G4171><s%> against <S%G3326><s%> him <S%G3588><s%> who sat <S%G2521><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the horse, <S%G2462><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> against <S%G3326><s%> his <S%G846><s%> army. <S%G4753><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> The beast <S%G2342><s%> was taken, <S%G4084><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> him <S%G5127><s%> the false prophet <S%G5578><s%> who worked <S%G4160><s%> the signs <S%G4592><s%> in his <S%G846><s%> sight, <S%G1799><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> he deceived <S%G4105><s%> those who had received <S%G2983><s%> the mark <S%G5480><s%> of the beast <S%G2342><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> those who worshiped <S%G4352><s%> his <S%G846><s%> image. <S%G1504><s%> These two <S%G1417><s%> were thrown <S%G906><s%> alive <S%G2198><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the lake <S%G3041><s%> of fire <S%G4442><s%> that burns <S%G2545><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> sulfur. <S%G2303><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> The rest <S%G3062><s%> were killed <S%G615><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> the sword <S%G4501><s%> of him <S%G3588><s%> who sat <S%G2521><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the horse, <S%G2462><s%> the sword which <S%G3588><s%> came forth <S%G1607><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> his <S%G846><s%> mouth. <S%G4750><s%> <S%G2532><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> the birds <S%G3732><s%> were filled <S%G5526><s%> with <S%G1537><s%> their <S%G846><s%> flesh. <S%G4561><s%>
